name: Error401: Roam
description:
Context: After a post apolyptic event, you become trapped inside a abandoned small base. You must build a ladder out. But there is a animatronic inside with you.

/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / 

Before you head in: This game is just a prototype of what I planned to accomplish. There is no textures in the buildings and some other missing things. But this is my first "Finished" game. Mostly I just came back to this and finished whatever. Anyways, maybe you should play it.

/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / Controls:

Normal WASD movement.

Flashlight : F

Sprint : Left Shift

Interact : E

/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /
